relevant_endpoints:
#### countDensityGroupByTag_2
- Method: GET
- Path: /users/count/density/groupBy/tag
- Parameters:
  - name: bboxes
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: WGS84 coordinates in the following format: id1:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|id2:lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|... OR lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|lon1,lat1,lon2,lat2|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)
  - type: string
  - default: 8.67,49.39,8.71,49.42
  - name: bcircles
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: WGS84 coordinates + radius in meter in the following format: id1:lon,lat,r|id2:lon,lat,r|... OR lon,lat,r|lon,lat,r|...; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)
  - type: string
  - name: bpolys
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: WGS84 coordinates given as a list of coordinate pairs (as for bboxes) or GeoJSON FeatureCollection. The first point has to be the same as the last point and MultiPolygons are only supported in GeoJSON; no default value (one boundary parameter must be defined)
  - type: string
  - name: contributionType
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: Filter contributions by contribution type: 'creation', 'deletion', 'tagChange', 'geometryChange' or a combination of them; no default value
  - type: string
  - name: filter
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: Combines several attributive filters, e.g. OSM type, the geometry (simple feature) type, as well as the OSM tag; no default value
  - type: string
  - default: type:way and natural=*
  - name: format
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: Output format geojson (for /groupBy/boundary resources only), csv, or json; default: json
  - type: string
  - default: json
  - name: groupByKey
  - in: query
  - required: True
  - description: OSM key e.g.: 'highway', 'building'; no default value (one groupByKey parameter must be defined)
  - type: string
  - default: building
  - name: groupByValues
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: OSM value(s) e.g.: 'primary', 'residential'; default: no value
  - type: string
  - name: showMetadata
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: Boolean operator 'true' or 'false'; default: 'false'
  - type: string
  - name: time
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: ISO-8601 conform timestring(s); default: latest timestamp within dataset
  - type: string
  - default: 2014-01-01/2017-01-01/P1Y
  - name: timeout
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: Custom timeout in seconds; no default value
  - type: string
- Request Body Schema:
None
